(촀\0The sky is alive with shooting starsn\0\0
\0
(촀\0n\0!
\0 I can't look away or
I might miss one!

I've been staring up at the night sky
so I wouldn't miss a single shooting
star, butn\0\0(촀\0my poor aching neck!

(촀\0I've been so entranced by this
meteor shower,
\0 I've forgotten
to wish on even one star!

Seeing a rainbow makes me happy.
\0(촀\0
But seeing one with someone at my
side makes me doubly happy.

What a lovely rainbown\0\0
\0 (촀\0All my little
worries have just disappeared,
n\0.

(촀\0A rainbow is like an exquisitely
wrapped present from the sky.

(촀\0Today must be our lucky day!
\0
Getting to see a double rainbow is
like winning a lottery in the sky.

(촀\0A double rainbown\0\0 How beautifuln\0\0\0\0(\0촀\0When such a rare thing happens,
\0( 촀\0
I can't help but wonder if it might
be some kind of omen!

A double rainbown\0\0 (촀\0My eyes are
in love with the sky right now,
darling. 
\0I simply can't look away!

Just look at that shimmering aurora!
\0
(촀\0It's like the winter sky has put on its
finest gown, n\0.

(촀\0The night sky has wrapped itself in
a veil of lightn\0\0 (촀\0What I wouldn't give
to wear something so gorgeous!

(:촀\0Without the dark night sky, 
\0the bright
beauty of the aurora wouldn't stand
out. 
\0(촀\0They make a perfect pair!

(촀\0I wonder where the plane that left
that vapor trail went to?
\0 What island
did it visit?

A sharp vapor trail drawn across a
blue expansen\0\0 (촀\0The sky looks like a
piece of modern art, yes?

(촀\0Something about seeing a vapor
trail in the sky makes me long to
go on a trip.

(9촀\0I confess,
\0 I'm terribly jealous of the
moon. 
\0Not only is she gorgeous,
\0(촀\0
she's always hanging out with stars!

The bright light of the full moon can't
compete with the sun's brilliant glow.
\0
(촀\0But at least I can look right at it!

(촀\0A full moon makes a late-night
stroll something truly special,
\0
don't you think?
(\0촀\0It's a gift the sky gives us each and
every month, n\0.
